items.abstract:
<jats:title>Abstract</jats:title>
				<jats:p> The structure of photobilin c is determined by oxidative degradation of <jats:sup>18</jats:sup>O-labeled material which is prepared by photooxidation of a derivative of bacteriochlorophyll c in the presence of molecular <jats:sup>18</jats:sup>O<jats:sub>2</jats:sub>.</jats:p>
title: Chemischer Strukturbeweis für Photobilin c und ein Beitrag zu seinem Bildungsmechanismus/Chemical Structure Determination for Photobilin c and a Contribution to the Formation Mechanism
subject: General Chemistry
